oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Memphis Custom-House
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “The Custom-House is located on the Chickasaw Bluffs on Front Street at the foot of Madison Avenue. It is also used for the post office. In 1906 an addition was built, making its capacity twice as much as before. It is surrounded by beautiful grounds and walks.”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: customs house; Front Street; Madison Avenue; post office;
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Raphael Tuck & Sons’ Series No. 2450 “Memphis, Tenn.” Photochromed in Saxony
